ValidationRule.description: Users with Employee Numbers can not be Non-Paychex Employees
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: LEN( EmployeeNumber ) > 0 && Non_Paychex_Employee__c && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Non_Paychex_Employee_User_Type__c , 'Generic User'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** Users with Employee Numbers can not be Non-Paychex Employees ****
